Author: filsid
Title: [ANN] FanFare:World’s First Blockchain-enabled Social Commerce Tokensale
Body: Fanfare | Private Sale 100% Subscribed Words cannot express how grateful we are to all our partners and advisors for pulling us through what has been termed a “crypto winter”. Their generous support has helped us to cross the finishing line for our private sale with modest success amidst a difficult crypto climate. Heartfelt thanks especially to Brighten Management, Crypto Assets Pro, Roger Ver, Spring Rain Global, Good Aura, Bull Bear and Amazing Global. https://medium.com/fanfareglobal/fanfare-private-sale-100-subscribed-96cdd8c2c5de

Author: MihailJ
Title: [ANN] FanFare:World’s First Blockchain-enabled Social Commerce Tokensale
Body: FAN now TRADING on LATOKEN Exchange    Following our successful ICO, we are happy to announce that Fanfare (FAN) will start trading on LATOKEN on 15.Nov.2018 GMT|1700, ringing the bell to the first exchange that we will be on.  It has been an exciting journey for the Fanfare Team since the inception of the idea, to create a Social Commerce ecosystem powered by blockchain. Our community of users are growing day by day, posting great videos for the brands they love, participating in the campaigns, and getting rewarded. Furthermore, for the in-app F:Coins which have been distributed, they can be exchanged for FAN TOKENS soon.  By getting on an Exchange quickly, it shows Fanfare’s commitment to the future of the ecosystem, to provide tradability and liquidity to the FAN TOKENS for our investors and users.  https://medium.com/fanfareglobal/fan-now-trading-on-latoken-exchange-f046f5910644

Author: gerymakgyaer
Title: [ANN] FanFare:World’s First Blockchain-enabled Social Commerce Tokensale
Body: SINGAPORE FEMALE FESTIVAL 2018    Themed “Create, Nurture and Transform”, The Singapore Female Festival recognises the journey of a woman through the different stages of her life — from 18 to 50. From education to lifelong learning; from saying “I do” to greeting “hello world”; and from looking awesome to keeping healthy, the Festival is all about creating sparks and empowering the woman today a smarter living tomorrow.  The Festival expects 30,000 visitors. And its targets are females between 18 and 50 years old, Students, Entrepreneurs, Executives & Managers, Singles, Brides-to-be and Mothers-to-be. It will be held over 2 days at Singapore EXPO Hall 4B on 8 and 9 September 2018, Saturday and Sunday.  During these 2 days, the program is full of Exhibition & Showcase, Festival Village, Forum & Dialogue, Bridal Fashion Runway, Make-up & Hair Show, Photography showcase and quotes of females impacting lives, but also floor and outdoor activities and many workshops.  Fanfare is anchored as The Singapore Female Festival official Social Commerce partner to help all the present brands to reach more audiences. https://medium.com/fanfareglobal/singapore-female-festival-2018-140103b556ed

Author: setpass
Title: [ANN] FanFare:World’s First Blockchain-enabled Social Commerce Tokensale
Body: The FAN Tokens would be used by the brands as a reward mechanism for content creators by converting their user-generated videos into shoppable videos. This allows every user-generated video to have the potential of becoming a point-of-sale for brands, thus making the entire social platform a marketplace for products. Users would also be incentivized for time spent on watching videos created by their friends or other consumers. Users can, in turn, use the FAN Tokens they have received as rewards to purchase products from the Fanfare eStore. Consumers who purchase products from the Fanfare eStore could further benefit from attractive discounts or additional rewards. Fanfare Global Pte Ltd, a Singapore-based company, has created this Fanfare ecosystem. The company is managed by serial entrepreneurs, successful business owners and professionals – from media, legal, marketing, finance and investment backgrounds with decades of combined experience – and is also backed by an investment firm. We have already built the most comprehensive centralized Social Commerce platform – The Fanfare App.

Author: eren0x
Title: [ANN] FanFare:World’s First Blockchain-enabled Social Commerce Tokensale
Body: A community-based two-sided platform for creating, curating and converting consumer-generated videos into instant Shoppable Videos for brands, Fanfare is purpose-built from ground up to enable Social Commerce. Its building blocks are conceived and created specifically with Social Commerce and Shoppable Videos in mind from the start. The features and functionalities have been well-thought out and designed precisely to help brands and consumers connect more intimately, by facilitating an integrated two-way Brand-Consumer engagement, so that brands can expand their relationships with their consumers to maintain trust, familiarity, and positivity.
